name: Skip The Line Eiffel Tower
description:
Why waste time standing in line?  Outfox the regular tourists and enjoy priority entrance to the Eiffel Tower and avoid standing in line for 2 to 4hrs!  After passing security you’ll have immediate access to the lifts that go to the second floor.  From there you can access the lifts to the summit and enjoy breathtaking views over Paris.
